00055 inline void CCrcCalculator::UpdateCrc(const quint8& byte, quint32& crcValue)
00056 {
00057        crcValue = (crcValue >> 8) ^ s_crcTable[byte ^ (crcValue & 0x000000FF)];
00058 }
